# MarshalStreamReadStringResult.IsEndedDueToNullTerminator property

Indicates whether or not a null terminator was encountered while reading from the stream which caused reading to stop. This may only be `true` is the read operation was requested to stop on null terminators.

```csharp
public bool IsEndedDueToNullTerminator { get; }
```
